trans-unit.source: A class used to send a single item (message) to or from a workflow service.

The item can be a built-in type such as primitive types, <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message" />, or <see cref="T:System.Xml.Linq.XElement" />; or an application-defined data contract, message contract, or XML serializable type.
When using this class, messages serialized on the wire are unwrapped, unless the data is a message contract type or of type <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>.
trans-unit.target: Al usar esta clase, los mensajes serializados en la conexión se desajustan, a menos que los datos sean un tipo de contrato de mensaje o de tipo <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendMessageContent> instance with a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send> activity.
trans-unit.target: En el siguiente ejemplo se muestra el uso de una instancia de la clase <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendMessageContent> con una actividad de la clase <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendMessageContent" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendMessageContent" /> class.
The data to send.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendMessageContent" /> class with the specified data to send.
The following example shows how to use this constructor.
trans-unit.target: En el siguiente ejemplo se muestra cómo usar este constructor.

trans-unit.source: The data to send.
The data type that appears on the service description.
It must be the same type as <c>message</c> or any base type of <c>message</c>.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendMessageContent" /> class with the specified message and message type.
Gets or sets the declared message type.
The declared message type.
<xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendMessageContent.DeclaredMessageType%2A> is the data type that will appear on the service description and WSDL.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendMessageContent.DeclaredMessageType%2A> es el tipo de datos que va a aparecer en la descripción del servicio y en WSDL.

trans-unit.source: You may want the service description to contain the base class type so that various derived classes can be sent and received by the service at runtime.
trans-unit.target: Puede desear que la descripción del servicio contenga el tipo de clase base para que el servicio pueda enviar y recibir distintas clases derivadas en tiempo de ejecución.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendMessageContent.DeclaredMessageType%2A> must be either the same as the argument type of the Message property or its base type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendMessageContent.DeclaredMessageType%2A> debe coincidir con el tipo de argumento de la propiedad Message o con su tipo base.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data to send.
The data to send.
trans-unit.target: Los datos que se van a enviar.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendMessageContent.DeclaredMessageType" /> property should be XAML-serialized.
<see langword="true" /> if the property should be serialized; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
